org.smooks.delivery

Interface FilterProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilterProvider, DOMFilterProvider, SAXFilterProvider, SaxNgFilterProvider

    public interface FilterProvider
    Produces a ContentDeliveryConfig for a given sequence of visitor bindings. Clients should check whether the FilterProvider is a provider for a visitor binding sequence before calling createContentDeliveryConfig(List, ApplicationContext, Map, List, DTDStore.DTDObjectContainer, Boolean) by calling isProvider(List). A FilterProvider that is not a provider will return an empty ContentDeliveryConfig in createContentDeliveryConfig(List, ApplicationContext, Map, List, DTDStore.DTDObjectContainer, Boolean).
